title.en: I'm a Curse Crafter, and I Don't Need an S-Rank Party!

altTitles.ja: Ｓランクパーティから解雇された【呪具師】～『呪いのアイテム』しか作れませんが、その性能はアーティファクト級なり……！～

altTitles.en: My S-Rank Party Fired Me for Being a Cursificer: I Can Only Make “Cursed Items”, but They're Artifact Class!

altTitles.ja-ro: S-Rank Party Kara Kaikosareta [Jugushi] ~"Noroi no Item" Shika Tsukuremasen ga, Sono Seinou wa Artifact-kyuu nari......!~

altTitles.vi: Chỉ biết chế tạo trang bị nguyền rủa, tôi bị đuổi khỏi tổ đội cấp S

description.en:
Gaile, a Cursificer, is left penniless when he's expelled from his party as soon as they reach S Rank. Apparently he wasn't contributing enough?! But they hadn't realized that his cursed items outperform even holy relics and legendary equipment!

Gaile decides to try to make a living on his own off of his cursed items.
description.ja:
【呪具師】のゲイルは大して貢献していないと、パーティがＳランクに昇格したと同時に無一文で追い出される。しかし、彼らは理解していなかった。ゲイルの作る呪具は、そこらの聖遺物や勇者の装備をも凌駕する性能を誇っていたことに…。ゲイルは呪具を活かして一人で生きていこうと決意しーー。

風変わりな職業・呪具師の大活躍が新感覚の爽快感で大反響!!
description.vi: Gaile, một nguyền cụ sư tài năng, đã bị các đồng đội phản bội khi tổ đội đạt được hạng S. Họ không ngờ ràng các nguyền cụ của anh ta còn mạnh hơn cả thánh tích và các trang bị thần thoại. Sau khi bị đuổi khỏi tổ đội, Gaile quyết định tự mình kiếm sống bằng những nguyền cụ do mình tạo ra. Chuyến phiêu lưu của anh chàng nguyền cụ sư chính thức bắt đầu.
description.pt-br:
A versão mangá de um dos romances de fantasia isekai mais populares de Shousetsuka ni Narou!

Gaile, um Cursificer, fica sem um tostão quando é expulso de seu grupo assim que chegam ao Rank S. Aparentemente ele não estava contribuindo o suficiente?! Mas eles não tinham percebido que seus itens amaldiçoados superam até mesmo relíquias sagradas e equipamentos lendários!

Gaile decide tentar ganhar a vida por conta própria com seus itens amaldiçoados.

altTitles.ja: 花荊の復讐婚

description.en:
Juna, who had been secretly involved in wicked deeds to put her beloved Arendt on the throne, was betrayed by Arendt and his stepsister, Elena, when she had defeated all her enemies and was sent to the guillotine—
Awakening as her 10-years-younger self, Juna vows to make them pay! To seek revenge, she uses the natural magic she had been hiding and visits Arendt's older brother, Clavis, to propose marriage. However, Arendt was the man whom Juna had driven to his death in her previous life for a crime she did not commit.

altTitles.en: Masculine Puppy
My Male Dog

description.en: I picked up a puppy, but it turned out it's not just a puppy." What if the puppy you picked up off the street turned out to actually be a man, one with an amazing face and physique? Jion accidentally became the savior of one puppy but the next day, the puppy was nowhere to be found, with a tall man lying next to her instead. Then accidentally kissing turns him back into a puppy, and then back into a man. A confusing cohabitation between her and the world's cutest puppy and at the same time, the world's sexiest man begins.

title.en: Itsuwari no Maid wa Goshujin-sama ni Dekiaisareru

altTitles.ja: 偽りのメイドはご主人様に溺愛される

description.en: If I were to be reborn, I’d want to be a glamorous noblewoman from a novel! However, Charlotte's wish is in vain as she is reborn as a maid in a duke's household. Frustrated with her daily life, she channels her feelings into writing erotic novels under the pen name Amelie Lafayette. One day, Charlotte receives a beautiful dress and wig from Madame Camellia at a bookstore. Dressed elegantly, she begins to enjoy her temporary life as a noblewoman. However, her luck runs out when her master catches her. What would happen if he found out a mere maid was wandering around in such attire? "Charlotte? Why are you dressed like that?" "I think you have the wrong person. My name is Amelie Lafayette!

altTitles.en: I Want to Stop the Murders

description.en: Sarin, an art student who wants to hide her past as a psychopathic killer, encounters Sarang, the son of a past victim. As more incidents unfold, the pursuit of the truth leads to a shocking revelation...

title.en: A Divorced Evil Lady Bakes Cakes

description.en: I had been working hard as the Duchess for nine years, supporting my quiet and indifferent husband, but all I was left with was contempt, indifference, and accusal of having a love affair. So when he finally asked for a divorce to marry his long-time lover... “There’s a limit to what I can endure for this marriage. No matter how much you cry or plead to the Emperor, I can’t stand it anymore.” “Can I sign here?” “So if you pretend to be poor like last time, this time… what? I waved divorce papers on an indifferent day. “I’m done. Can I go now?” “Oh, since we both had lovers, of course, I won’t be receiving alimony, but you’ll surely return my dowry, right?” “What are you gonna do with that little money?”, asked my husband, who had not cared what he had done for the past nine years. I laughed confidently and answered: “I’m going to open a dessert cafe.”

title.en: Neko no Te datte Yaku ni Tatsu

altTitles.ja: 猫の手だって役に立つ

altTitles.en: Even a Cat's Paw Can Be Useful

description.en:
One day, Takase's beloved cat Mi-chan transforms into a human! Can Mi-chan make Takase, who loves cats but has no interest in human girls, fall in love with her?

(Source: Seikaisha, translated)
description.ja:
猫!? それとも人!?

ある日、高瀬くんが愛でていた猫のみーちゃんが人間に大変身!
なんと、みーちゃんは人間に変身できる猫だった!
猫は大好きだけど、人間には素っ気ない高瀬くんをみーちゃんは振り向かせることができるのか!?

猫大好き&人間キョーミなしの高瀬くんと、人間に変身できる猫のみーちゃんの、猫まみれラブコメ!

description.en: Jung Eon is a maid who works in the house of a rich and powerful family. She dreams of escaping a life of servitude and saves every penny she earns. One day, she receives an unexpected proposal from her childhood friend and boss, Hyun Mae-hwa. He's as pretty as a flower, but has a horrible personality. Mae-hwa says he wants to marry her because of a prophecy that says Jung Eon has six benefactors in his destiny. He thinks she is the source of his financial luck. She accepts, thinking it's a chance to change her life.

After experiencing the bitter taste of love during her university days, Yeon Haru had stayed far away from romance. But now, two perfect men—Oh Seungwon, the top star at her company, who is flawless in appearance, education, and work skills, and Seo Jungwoo, the CEO of a neighboring company, SJW Tech, who also possesses looks, abilities, and wealth—are pursuing her. "How can two perfect men get involved with someone like me, who’s been distant from romance all my life?!" Thus begins the fierce flirting competition between Seo Jungwoo and Oh Seungwon, each determined to win Yeon Haru's heart.

title.en: The Reason I Have to Be a Villain

altTitles.en: The Reason I Have to Be a Villainess
The Unintentional Villainess

description.en: After being reborn in a novel, Renee Blair is determined to transform her reputation as "the villainess of the century," which will prevent her death at the hands of Sir Dywen the dragon slayer! But then she learns that the original Renee had been controlled by a pop-up game system of daily missions that forced her to either commit evil deeds or face painful penalties for declining. With this system continuing to affect her as well, can the new Renee outsmart the game and reset her evil legacy?

altTitles.fr: La Grande Jahy ne Perd Jamais

altTitles.en: The Great Jahy Will Not Be Defeated!
Jahy-sama Won't Be Discouraged!

altTitles.ja: ジャヒー様はくじけない！

description.en:
Jahy-sama (pronounced jah-hee) is an existence to be feared and respected throughout the Demon Realm. Well, was.

The (former) Demon Realm No. 2 is now busy with house chores and work…in the human realm! Her dinner is just beansprouts, and she can't afford anything except water at cafes, but she won't get discouraged!

---
**Note:**
Jahy's shirt says '魔界復興', which seems to translate to 'Demon Realm Restoration'.
description.ru: Джахи-сама - существо, которое боялись и уважали во всем демоническом мире. Ну, когда-то... Вторая по силе (прежде) мира демонов теперь занята домашними заботами и работой... в человеческом мире! Её ужин - одна фасоль, а в кафе она не может себе позволить ничего кроме воды, но её никогда не сломить!

title.en: The Supporting Duck Waiting for the Breakup

altTitles.en: This Duck Wants to Fly Solo

description.en: I have been reincarnated in the body of a supporting character of a Ro-fan novel. Although at first it was a little disappointing I was the irrelevant character that gets divorced four different times and doesn't play a major role in the novel, at the end I thought it wasn't actually that bad. Because she's still the precious daughter of the “Duck Family”, one of the noble families of our region. She has a ton of people that takes care of her and even helps her to prepare her food and a huge room in a mansion…! Compared to my previous life, this is truly a paradise. To be honest, this might be even better than going through all the difficulties the leads of the story have to endure. I just had to wait for the 4th and last break that my character experiences by the male protagonist in the novel, but all of a sudden: “” Wasn't I clear enough? “” “” …… “” “” I will never break up our engagement “ What is happening? Is his obsession changing from the female lead to me?!

title.en: Dungeon ni Hisomu Yandere na Kanojo ni Ore wa Nando mo Korosareru

altTitles.ja: ダンジョンに潜むヤンデレな彼女に俺は何度も殺される

altTitles.en: My Yandere Girlfriend Lurks in the Dungeon and Kills Me Over and Over Again

altTitles.ru: Моя Девушка-Яндере, Прячущаяся в Подземелье, Убивает Меня Снова и Снова

altTitles.ja-ro: Dungeon ni Hisomu Yandere na Kanojo ni Ore wa Nando mo Korosareru

altTitles.ko: 던전에 숨어든 얀데레 그녀에게 나는 몇 번이고 죽는다

altTitles.vi: Tôi bị bạn gái đâm chết hết lần này đến khác

description.en: A fantasy story about Kiska, a boy who is mistreated by the villagers. He manages to survive thanks to his childhood friend Namia, who was the only one by his side. One day, Namia is murdered by three men, and Kiska is accused of the crime and banished to an inescapable class S dungeon. However, he finds himself in a different world where he can use "Save and Reset" to get back on his feet no matter how many times he dies. The story is about Kiska's quest for revenge against those who wronged him and his friend
description.ja:
何度死んだって、何度倒れたって、やり直す――！

冤罪により脱出不可能な高難易度ダンジョンの奥地へ追放された、なんの変哲もない男・キスカ。絶望する間もなく、突然モンスターに殺されるその寸前、＜セーブ＆リセット＞のスキルが付与されて……！？

description.en: Win love! Win 500 million won! A competition begins where three single women in their thirties put 500 million won on the line to break free from being single. A princess without her prince, Gong Jurim, a trash collector, Kang Seon, and a firm believer in premarital purity, Kim Chaeyul! Who will be the ultimate winner of this singles showdown?
description.ko: 사랑도 얻고! 5억도 얻고! 만 30세 여자 3명의 5억을 건 모솔탈출내기가 시작된다.왕자 없는 공주림 , 쓰레기 수집가 강선아 , 혼전순결 김채율!과연 모솔대첩의 우승자는 누가 될 것인가?fr

altTitles.ja: 他校のボーイッシュ彼女

altTitles.en: Boyish Girlfriend from Another School

title.en: Your Majesty, I Will Raise Him This Time

altTitles.ja: 陛下、今度は私が育てます！

description.en: "Who would have thought that the day would come when I would be killed by my own son..." Empress Dahlia of the Empire is killed by her son’s rebellion. Dahlia, who has been kept in the dark finds it difficult to comprehend the drastic change of her son. "I’ll accept any punishment. Please, give me one more chance to face that child...!" Dahlia, having turned back time, need to face her strict husband, Klaus, in order to restore their already severed parent-child relationship. Can she use this opportunity to redo the parenting and avoid the worst future?

title.en: Bing Jiao Shidi You Zai Gen Wo Zhuang Kelian

altTitles.zh: 病娇师弟又在跟我装可怜

altTitles.zh-ro: Bìng Jiāo Shīdì Yòu Zài Gēn Wǒ Zhuāng Kělián

altTitles.en: The Yandere Martial Junior Brother Is Pretending to Be Pitiful to Me

altTitles.es: El Yandere Hermano Menor Pretende Ser Lamentable Conmigo Otra vez

description.en: A graceful lady was reborn as an adorable girl?! Haven't yet rejoiced for her luck to live again, Liu Zhaozhao had already found out her previous pure and good-natured martial junior brother who had been obedient to her has unexpectedly become the arch-villain. What exactly had happened?
description.es: ¿Una elegante dama renació como una niña adorable? Aún no se había regocijado por su suerte de volver a vivir, Liu Zhaozhao ya había descubierto que su anterior hermano menor marcial, puro y bondadoso, que había sido obediente a ella, se había convertido inesperadamente en el archivillano. ¿Qué había pasado exactamente?
description.zh: 御姐重生成萌妹？！ 还没等柳昭昭庆幸自己能重生再来，她就发现，先前对她千依百顺的纯良小师弟，竟然变成了疯批大魔头？ 这到底是怎么回事？

description.en: Claudia, the successor of the priestly family, is framed by her half-brother and relegated to a remote territory. Adjacent to the land of the dead, such as undead and vampires, ‘The Tomb of Priests’, where priests suffer from hard labor; To Lindel Abbey! 'I have to live in this abandoned house for three years?!' What awaits her with her pounce on her A shabby monastery! A colleague who sees her divine power as a way to make money! An assassination attempt whose culprit is unknown! + α “Carel, you know what? People see you and call you my ‘dog’.” Eight years ago, while awakening as an immortal being, he met Claudia. The boy who came to be by her side, Karel. Karel learns that someone is trying to kill Claudia. In order to protect her, she runs to her Lindel in her month... … With the appearance of Claudia, the quiet periphery city of Lindel An accident begins to stir up excitement! What else happened today in Lindell, which is full of geeks?!

altTitles.en: Deviant Love

altTitles.ja: 異常者の愛

altTitles.en: An Abnormal Person's Love

description.en: The demon in human form. An innocent girl sacrificed. Kazumi Ichinose. 16 years old. high school student. Midou Saki fell in love with him when he was an elementary school student. That was the beginning of hell. Jealousy. Obsession. Pools of Blood. Tears. Death. Common sense, words, nothing makes sense. Misfortune befell those loved by "him". Love starts with blood. This is the beginning.
description.pt: O demônio em forma humana. Uma garota inocente foi sacrificada. Kazumi Ichinose. 16 anos Estudante do ensino médio. Midou Saki se apaixonou por ele quando ele era um estudante do ensino fundamental. Esse foi o começo do inferno. Ciúmes. Obsessão. Poças de sangue. Lágrimas. Morte. Senso comum, palavras, nada faz sentido. A desgraça caiu sobre aquelas amadas por "ele". O amor começa com sangue. Este é o começo.

description.en: What happens when a girl from a quaint and small town meets the son of a Yakuza crime lord? Will she be able to change him for the better or will he continue down the dangerous and violent path?

altTitles.en: Hunter Hunter
HUNTER×HUNTER
HxH

altTitles.ja: ハンター×ハンター

description.en: Hunters are a special breed, dedicated to tracking down treasures, magical beasts, and even other men. But such pursuits require a license, and less than one in a hundred thousand can pass the grueling qualification exam. Those who do pass gain access to restricted areas, amazing stores of information, and the right to call themselves Hunters.
description.fa:
هانتر‌ها، افراد کنجکاوی که به دنبال گنج‌ها، مجرم‌های خطرناک، مکان‌های ناشناخته و اسرارآمیز، جانوران افسانه‌ای و... هستند. البته برای دست یابی به این موقعیت نیاز به مجوزی است که در بین هر صدهزار نفر تنها یک نفر می‌تواند در آزمون آن موفق شود.
این داستان درمورد چهار نوجوانه که در آزمون هانترها با هم روبه‌رو می‌شوند:
گون، پسری که به دنبال پدرش می‌گردد. کیلوا، پسری که می‌خواهد زندگی جدیدی را شروع کند. لئوریو، پسری که قصد دارد پزشک شود و کوراپیکا، پسری که می‌خواهد انتقام قبیله خود‌ را بگیرد.
description.pt: Hunters são uma raça especial, dedicada a rastrear tesouros, animais mágicos, e até mesmo outros homens. Mas tais atividades requerem uma licença, e menos de um em cem mil pode passar no exame de qualificação esgotante. Aqueles que não passam tem acesso a áreas restritas, lojas de incríveis informações, bem como o direito de chamar-se de Hunters.
description.vi: Thợ Săn là những người đi chu du thế giới, đối mặt với hiểm nguy. Từ bắt giữ tội phạm cho đến nhưng cuộc thám hiểm trên các hòn đảo để tìm kho báu. Câu chuyện bắt đầu khi người cha của một cậu bé tên Gon mất tích đã khá lâu, nên cậu bé quyết định trở thành Thợ Săn với hy vọng tìm được cha mình. Khi được 12 tuổi Gon bắt đầu cuộc hành trình của mình để được tham gia vào "Cuộc thi Thợ Săn Kỳ Tài", ai cũng biết tỉ lệ thành công rất thấp, có khi chết lúc nào không hay. Trong cuộc thi cậu đã kết bạn với Kurapica, Leorio và Killua. Với tình bạn, họ đã trải qua biết bao nhiêu là thử thách, hiểm nguy trên cuộc hành trình của một người Thợ Săn... Còn về phần họ trải qua những thử thách gì và như thế nào thì mời các bạn theo dõi...
description.es-la: Sigue la historia de Gon Freecss, un joven que descubre que su padre, a quien creía muerto, es un legendario Cazador, un miembro de una élite que se especializa en localizar tesoros, bestias raras o personas peligrosas. Decidido a encontrar a su padre, Gon emprende un viaje para convertirse en Cazador. En su camino, se enfrenta a desafíos mortales y forma fuertes lazos con amigos como Killua, Leorio y Kurapika. A medida que avanza en su viaje, Gon descubre que el mundo de los Cazadores es mucho más peligroso y complejo de lo que imaginaba.
description.pt-br:
A série conta a história de Gon Freecss, um garoto de 12 anos que pretende se tornar um Hunter, um caçador de tesouros, lugares perdidos e criaturas estranhas.

Contudo, ao contrário da maioria dos Hunters que procuram fama e dinheiro, o herói da história tem uma motivação maior para querer ser um caçador – encontrar seu pai – um dos mais famosos hunters do mundo.

Mas não é qualquer um que pode se tornar um Hunter. Para poder praticar essa reconhecida profissão, é necessário ter uma licença especial – e para tirá-la é preciso passar – e sobreviver – a exames com milhares de inscritos. Uma vez aprovado e com sua licença Hunter em mãos, o caçador passa a ter direito a acessar áreas restritas, informações secretas e consegue acumular facilmente uma grande fortuna de acordo com seus feitos ? incluindo ir atrás de Hunters que usam seus poderes para objetivos escusos.

title.en: Shoukan sareta Kenja wa Isekai wo Yuku ~Saikyou nano wa Fuyou Zaiko no Item deshita~

altTitles.ja: 召喚された賢者は異世界を往く ～最強なのは不要在庫のアイテムでした～

altTitles.en: A Sage Is Summoned to Another World: The Undesired Items Are Now the Strongest

altTitles.es-la: El sabio es invocado a otro mundo ~Los artículos más fuertes eran los menos deseados del inventario~

altTitles.ko: 소환된 현자는 이세계를 누빈다 ~최강인 것은 필요없는 재고 아이템이었습니다~

altTitles.zh-hk: 被召喚的賢者前往異世界～廢棄庫存道具才是最強～

altTitles.zh: 被召唤的贤者前往异世界～废弃库存道具才是最强～

altTitles.en: Wise Man Is Summoned to Another World ~The Strongest Items Were Those Less Desired in Inventory~

description.en:
Touya, the strongest player in the game Pandemic World Online, had won so many items that he decided to create an alternate account to store the extra ones. While playing this very game in his second account, he was summoned to another world as a character he made, where the people were merrily expecting a hero. However, when it is known that he doesn't have the title of a hero, he is discarded and replaced by another person. Now, he must survive in an another world with the account he merely used to store his extra items in.  


---
description.es-la:
Touya, el jugador mas fuerte del juego Pandemic World Online, ha ganado tantos items que decidió crear una cuenta alternativa para almacenarlos, mientras jugaba fue invocado a otro mundo, pero al no tener la categoría de héroe es desechado y remplazado por otra persona, ahora tendrá que sobrevivir solo en ese mundo y con el personaje que creó para almacenar esos objetos.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9275ei/) (Japanese)

title.en: Drug Store Tenin Sacchan no Nichijou

altTitles.ja: ドラッグストア店員さっちゃんの日常

altTitles.vi: Chuyện nàng Sa ở tiệm thuốc

altTitles.en: Daily Life of Sa-chan, a Drugstore Clerk

altTitles.fr: Le quotidien de Sa-Chan, une vendeuse comme une autre
Le quotidien de Sa-chan, une employée de pharmacie

altTitles.vi: Chuyện Đời Thường Của Nhân Viên Hiệu Thuốc, Sa-Chan
Cuộc Sống Thường Ngày Của Nhân Viên Hiệu Thuốc Sa-Chan

description.en: A series between the expressionless drugstore clerk, Sa-chan, and her boisterous childhood friend who's head over heels over Sa-chan but hesitant in confessing his love for her. Join them in their romcom-packed everyday life working at a drugstore.
description.fr: > Une série réunissant une employée de pharmacie sans expression, Sa-chan, et son ami d'enfance turbulent qui est fou amoureux d'elle mais qui hésite à lui avouer son amour. Accompagnez-les dans leur quotidien plein de comédie amoureuse en travaillant dans une pharmacie.
description.id: Seri antara petugas toko obat tanpa ekspresi, Sa-chan, dan teman masa kecilnya yang riuh yang jungkir balik terhadap Sa-chan tetapi ragu-ragu dalam mengakui cintanya padanya. Bergabunglah dengan mereka dalam kehidupan sehari-hari mereka yang penuh romansa bekerja di toko obat.
description.ja: ドラッグストアで働くさっちゃんとその幼なじみが両思いなんだけど、お互い気づかなくて毎日やきもきする話です。
description.pt-br: Uma série entre a inexpressiva balconista da drogaria, Sa-chan, e seu turbulento amigo de infância que está de ponta-cabeça por Sa-chan, mas hesita em confessar seu amor por ela. Junte-se a eles em sua vida cotidiana repleta de comédia romântica trabalhando em uma farmácia.

altTitles.ja: 高音さんと嵐ちゃん

title.en: Is it Normal to Raise a Yandere Heroine as a Villainess ?!

altTitles.zh: 身为恶役女配的我养成病娇女主很正常吧？！

altTitles.pt-br: Como A Vilã, Criar Uma Protagonista Yandere É Normal, Não É?!

altTitles.zh-ro: Shen Wei E Yi Nv Pei De Wo Yang Cheng Bìng Jiao Nv Zhu Hen Zheng Chang Ba?!

description.en:
Jiang Yang was a lead designer for a popular game company until she fell to her death while gathering inspiration for a new game. After waking up in a world of cultivation, she trained tirelessly to return to her original world, when a thread of fate pulled her into the world of an otome game.

Jiang Yang quickly realizes she is in the world of the very first game she had worked on. The thread of fate connected her to Stardew, the heroine of the game who is being bullied during her first year at the Royal Academy of Magic.

As the game progresses, Jiang Yang remembers the ridiculous story the game follows, and she decides that she can’t stand by while the game makes Stardew suffer. She helps Stardew deal with the flirtatious love interest of the original game, Crown Prince Miller, and even imparts her with some of her cultivation power. To protect Stardew from the game’s story, she even puts herself in danger. However, as Jiang Yang and Stardew’s relationship becomes closer, Jiang Yang realizes that the thread of fate connecting her and Stardew is not as simple as she imagined.
description.zh: 姜央是一名为了游戏新作采风不幸摔下悬崖穿越到修真世界的游戏主美，为了回到原本的世界，姜央努力修炼，终于要飞升成神回到原本的世界，结果因为一条神秘的因果线，被强制牵引到了一个魔法世界中（还是个乙女游戏，游戏刚开始），捡到了初入魔法校园就被恶役女二欺负的的游戏女主。 姜央这时反应过来，这不就是当初让自己穿越的那个倒霉换皮游戏吗？而自己的因果线就连接在了游戏女主星露的身上。姜央以为只要跟着游戏通关，自己就能回到最初的现实世界，但是随着游戏发展，姜央再次回想起了煞笔策划写的沙雕剧情，看着星露受苦，具有强烈责任心和道德感的姜央选择对星露出手相助，不仅要帮对方清理花心皇子那些烂桃花，还传授修真技巧以防对方被其他学生霸凌，甚至有时还得搭上自己的身子！！随着姜央和星露的交往越来越密切，姜央发现自己在星露身上的因果线没有自己想象中那么简单……
description.pt-br:
Jiang Yang é a diretora de designe de arte de um jogo, ao coletar referências para uma nova produção, cai de um penhasco e acaba atravessando para um mundo de cultivo. Para voltar ao seu mundo original, Jiang Yang se dedica ao cultivo e finalmente está prestes a ascender como uma divindade para retornar. No entanto, devido a uma misteriosa linha do destino, ela é forçada a ser puxada para um mundo de magia (que também é um jogo otome, e o jogo acabou de começar). Nesse novo mundo, ela encontra a protagonista do jogo, Xing Lu, sendo intimidada pela vilã secundária logo no início da academia de magia.

Jiang Yang percebe que este é o jogo problemático que a fez atravessar os mundos originalmente. Sua linha do destino está ligada a Xing Lu, a protagonista do jogo. Jiang Yang acredita que, seguindo a história do jogo até o fim, ela poderá retornar ao seu mundo real. No entanto, conforme o jogo se desenvolve, Jiang Yang relembra as tramas ridículas escritas pelo roteirista idiota do jogo. Vendo o sofrimento de Xing Lu, a fortemente responsável e moralmente íntegra Jiang Yang decide ajudar Xing Lu. Ela não apenas ajuda a livrar Xing Lu dos pretendentes indesejados, incluindo o príncipe mulherengo, mas também lhe ensina técnicas de cultivo para que ela possa se defender dos outros estudantes. Às vezes, isso até envolve sacrificar-se fisicamente! 

À medida que Jiang Yang e Xing Lu se tornam mais próximas, Jiang Yang descobre que sua linha do destino com Xing Lu é mais complexa do que ela imaginava...

title.en: It’s Time to Change the Genre

altTitles.en: The Villainess Flips the Script!
I Will Change the Genre

altTitles.ja: ジャンル、変えさせて頂きます！

altTitles.en: I Will Make an Effort to Change the Genre

description.en:
I reincarnated into my favorite genre for novels.

I became the villainous aunt who mistreats the young protagonist. I felt sorry for my nephew who would grow up as the protagonist in a revengeful plot, so I’ll try my best to take care of my nephew until his uncle shows up and takes him as per the original plot.

But then…

“M-Mom!”

I’ve become his mother all of a sudden?

“I don’t know your circumstances, but how could I bear to separate a mother from her son? Lady, come with us to Winterwald.”

Hey, Kim Luca! How are you going to fix this misunderstanding?

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%9E%A5%EB%A5%B4%EB%A5%BC-%EB%B0%94%EA%BF%94%EB%B3%B4%EB%8F%84%EB%A1%9D-%ED%95%98%EA%B2%A0%EC%8A%B5%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/2494)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/I-Will-Change-the-Genre/3487)
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/74301)

altTitles.ja: ソラニン

description.en:
After graduating from college, Meiko went straight to work as an office lady, but she can't help feeling there should be something more to life. Determined to find a worthier goal, she quits work, but can she actually make her nebulous dreams come true- and how will her sudden decision affect her relationship with her boyfriend Taneda?

---

- English release by [Viz Media](https://www.viz.com/read/manga/solanin/product/1889)
- Indonesian release by m&c! Comics
description.ru:
Во-первых, это - не комедия. На самом деле это рассказ о жизни людей в период взросления. О том, что бывает, когда кончается юность, молодость… и начинается то, что мы привыкли называть взрослой жизнью… Смогут ли герои выдержать это испытание?  
  
Грустная история, разбавленная местами юмором. Не для того, чтобы посмеяться… просто, чтобы контраст был еще больше… между Вашей жизнью… и Жизнью…  
  
Ещё одна работа Инио Асано.  
  
История о молодой паре, Мэйко Иноэ и Наруо Танеда. Взрослая жизнь заставляет Танеду бросить собственную группу, но он не перестаёт мечтать. Мэйко уходит со скучной работы, но очень скоро осознаёт, что её вновь обретённая свобода бессмысленна. Реалистично, иногда даже очень смешно и трогательно, но без сползания в мыльную оперу. Чудесно, как сама жизнь.

altTitles.ja: 外道の歌

altTitles.en: Reprobate's Song
Fiend's Song
The Villain's Song

description.en: Kamo and his partner Tora continue to work in the underworld as avengers for hire, taking on jobs from the victims of violent crimes and families seeking vengeance for wrongs done to them.

altTitles.ja: ブラックシープ

description.en:
To all the black sheep, resist your fate.
Shizunaga Rei, the son of a powerful yakuza boss, lives as a regular high school student. But one day, his father is attacked by hostile forces, and Rei is suddenly appointed as the acting leader. Unexplainable events begin to unfold around Rei, and alongside his secretary, Ouga Masumi, Rei witnesses the reality of the organization’s society—?!
An unofficial compilation of oneshots / 4-komas by Cacomistle (カコミスル) in their twitter profile.

altTitles.ja: タワーダンジョン

description.en:
The setting is a certain kingdom. In order to save the kidnapped princess of the kingdom, the Kingsguard squadron challenges the "Dragon Tower", a gigantic structure floating in the middle of the sky, but they are blocked by powerful demons. A provocation is made by a neighboring village to replenish the injured personnel, and when a young man is sent to the tower, the wheel of fate begins to turn.
___
[Alt Official Raw (Comic DAYS)](https://comic-days.com/episode/14079602755364316216)
[Official English (K MANGA) - United States only!](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10604/episode/353121)
description.ja: 邪悪な魔術師は王を弑し、姫をさらって天から降りてきた巨大な建造物「竜の塔」に逃げ去ったーー。王国の近衛戦団は姫を救うべく塔を登ってゆくが、強力な魔物に阻まれる。負傷者の穴を埋めるべく、ある村から農夫の青年ユーヴァがやって来て・・・・・・？
description.uk:
Місце дії - певне королівство. Щоб врятувати викрадену принцесу королівства, загін королівської гвардії кидає виклик «Драконячій вежі» - гігантській споруді, що ширяє посеред неба, але їм стають на заваді могутні демони.

Сусіднє селище влаштовує провокацію, щоб замінити поранених, і коли до вежі відправляють юнака, колесо долі починає обертатися.

Історія про меч, чари та дослідження лабіринту починається!
description.pt-br:
Para salvar a princesa Ignelia que foi sequestrada por um necromante, o Batalhão da Guarda Real se aventura pela “Torre do Dragão”, uma estrutura gigantesca que costumava flutuar no meio do céu, mas são bloqueados por criaturas poderosas. 
Uma ordem de recrutamento é enviado para uma aldeia vizinha para repor os soldados feridos, e quando um jovem é enviado para a Torre, a roda do destino começa a girar.

Começa a história de espadas, feitiçaria e exploração do labirinto!

title.en: Seirei-tachi no Rakuen to Risou no Isekai Seikatsu

altTitles.en: Paradise of Spirits and Ideal Life of Different World
Spirits Paradise and The Idle Another World Life

altTitles.ru: Рай духов и идеальная жизнь в другом мире

altTitles.ja: 精霊達の楽園と理想の異世界生活

altTitles.ja-ro: Seirei-tachi no Rakuen to Risō no Isekai Seikatsu

altTitles.zh: 精灵们的乐园与理想的异世界生活

altTitles.zh-hk: 精靈們的樂園與理想的異世界生活

altTitles.ja: Seireitati no Rakuen to Risou no Isekaikatsu

description.en: It's the Golden Week, and Morizono Yuuta can't wait to spend the next 11 days staying home and conquering all of his games and manga. After a trip to the supermarket to stock up on food however, he found himself stranded in a wasteland with no sight of human. Now he's just gonna have to find a way to live in this world aided only by some magic tools and numerous Spirits whom he came into contact with.

title.en: The Moon on a Rainy Night

altTitles.pt-br: A Lua em uma Noite Chuvosa

altTitles.ja: 雨夜の月

altTitles.fr: The Moon on a Rainy Night (Meian)

altTitles.es-la: La luna en una noche lluviosa

description.en: One rainy night, Saki is rushing to a piano lesson when she crashes into a beautiful, long-haired girl, dropping her sheet music in the process. Saki stutters an apology, but the girl simply hands back her sheet music and leaves without a word. Saki begins her first day of high school the following morning, only to find the stranger from the night before sitting at the desk next to hers. She learns that the girl’s name is Kanon and that she is not quite completely deaf, but very hard of hearing. Though Kanon needs to be close to people to read their lips, she tends to push people away with her icy demeanor. Through one kind gesture, Saki slowly begins breaking down the walls around Kanon, even as she feels something new blossoming within her. [Kodansha]
description.ko: 고등학교에 입학한 사키와 귀가 불편한 반 친구 카논. 사람들과 거리를 두는 카논이 안고 있는 것과 겉으론 보이지 않는 것. 그것을 알고자 하는 사키에게 카논도 점차···. 두 소녀의 눈에는 보이지 않는 것, 둘도 없이 소중한 것.
description.pt-br: Um dia, pouco antes de entrar no colégio, Kazuki Kaneda colide com uma garota estranha da mesma geração a caminho da aula de piano e machuca sua mão, mas a partitura que caiu silenciosamente, da outra parte é cuidadosamente recolhida e um curativo é recebido. Saki se reúne com a garota impressionante como colega de classe e descobre que seu nome é Oikawa Kanon e ela é surda. Na escola, Saki, que estava sozinha, tentou entender o som de Kanon, que manteve distância do ambiente por causa de sua deficiência, e sua atitude mudou gradualmente.

title.en: Gyakkou Shita Akuyaku Reijou wa, Naze ka Maryoku wo Ushinattanode Shinsou no Reijou ni Narimasu

altTitles.ja: 逆行した悪役令嬢は、なぜか魔力を失ったので深窓の令嬢になります

altTitles.en: The Villainess Who Traveled Back in Time Inexplicably Lost Her Magic, so She Went Into Seclusion
Somehow, the Villainess Who Regressed in Time Lost Her Magic Power, so She Turned Into a Secluded Maiden

altTitles.zh-hk: 逆行的惡役大小姐、在不知為何失去了魔力之後變成了深閨大小姐

altTitles.zh: 逆行的恶役大小姐、在不知为何失去了魔力之后变成了深闺大小姐

altTitles.id: Villainess yang Kehilangan Sihirnya  Setelah Kembali ke Masa Lalu  Memilih Untuk Mengurung Diri

description.en:
Rachel was chosen as the Crown Prince’s fiancée solely by virtue of the immense magical powers she possessed. Thus, when the Saint appeared, she feared that her most coveted position would get snatched away from her.

Spurred by jealousy, Rachel committed evil deeds against the Saint, resulting in her engagement getting broken. As further punishment, she was sent away to a monastery, but her carriage was attacked by bandits *en route*. Just when she thought that death was imminent, she woke up with a start… only to find herself three years in the past — with almost all of her magic gone, and her body so frail and weak that she could barely even leave her bed!

Determined to prevent fate from repeating itself, Rachel resolved to take full advantage of this second chance and call off her engagement pronto. But for some reason, the Crown Prince keeps refusing to break things off with her—?!

---
[Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9460fv/)
description.id:
Rachel dipilih sebagai tunangan putra mahkota hanya karena kekuatan sihir besar yang dimilikinya, Lalu, ketika sang santa muncul, dia takut kalau posisinya sebagai tunangan akan direbut darinya. 
Akhirnya, karena terbakar api cemburu, Rachel melakukan tindakan jahat kepada sang santa yang mengakibatkan tunangannya dibatalkan.
Kemudian setelah itu dia dihukum dengan dikirim ke kuil terpencil, tapi pada saat perjalanan, kendaraannya diserang oleh sekawanan bandit. 
Sesaat dia berpikir kalau kematiannya tidak akan bisa dihindari, dia ternyata telah terbangun dari tidurnya dan menyadari kalau dirinya telah kembali 3 tahun lalu bersamaan dengan menghilangnya kekuatan sihirnya.
Karena diberi kesempatan untuk mengulangi kembali kehidupannya, Rachel memutuskan memanfaatkan kesempatan ini untuk segera membatalkan pertunangannya sendiri.
Akan tetapi tidak disangka-sangka, sang putra mahkota malah menolak pembatalan pertunangannya, kira-kira kenapa ya?
description.ja:
魔力の高さから王太子の婚約者となるも、聖女の出現によりその座を奪われることを恐れたラシェル。
聖女に悪逆非道な行いをしたことで婚約破棄されて修道院送りとなり、
修道院へ向かう道中で賊に襲われて殺されてしまう。

死んだと思ったラシェルが目覚めると、なぜか3年前に戻っていたが
ほとんどの魔力を失い、ベッドから起き上がれないほどの病弱な体になってしまった。

今度は周りの人も自分も幸せな未来をつかむため、
これ幸いと今度はこちらから王太子との婚約を破棄しようとするが、
なぜか王太子が婚約破棄を拒否してきて!?
しかも魔力を失ったと思っていたのに、世界初の闇の精霊が私のもとへ!?

悪役令嬢が精霊と共に未来を変える異世界ハッピーファンタジー！
電子限定描き下ろし特典付き！

---
[Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9460fv/)

altTitles.en: Holy War Records Elna Saga

altTitles.ja: 聖戦記エルナサーガ

description.en: A war-torn world. The prince of Ansaz, Þjálfi the Immortal, continued his march with the strength of a demon god. The country he was aiming for was Arsatual. The princess, Elna, is incapable of using magic. But because of this, she is said to be able to use the sacred sword...
description.vi: Cuộc phiêu lưu của Công chúa Elna từ vương quốc Arthurtual và Hoàng tử Thjalfi từ vương quốc đối địch Ansuz. Tình yêu, phiêu lưu và chiến tranh, một bộ truyện mang đậm phong cách Gibili rất hay mà bạn không nên bỏ qua.

altTitles.en: Demon Slayer

altTitles.id: ดาบพิฆาตอสูร เล่ม

altTitles.ja: 鬼滅の刃

altTitles.en: Blade of Demon Destruction

description.en:
Since ancient times, rumors have abounded of man-eating demons lurking in the woods. Because of this, the local townsfolk never venture outside at night. Legend has it that a demon slayer also roams the night, hunting down these bloodthirsty demons.  
Ever since the death of his father, Tanjirou has taken it upon himself to support his mother and five siblings. Although their lives may be hardened by tragedy, they've found happiness. But that ephemeral warmth is shattered one day when Tanjirou finds his family slaughtered and the lone survivor, his sister Nezuko, turned into a demon. Adding to this sorrow, a demon hunter named Tomioka Giyuu arrived and was about to finish Nezuko off, but to his surprise she and Tanjiro started to protect each other. Seeing this oddity and Tanjiro's promising fighting skills, Giyuu decides to send them to his old mentor to be trained.  
So begins Tanjiro's life as a demon hunter, bound on a quest to cure his sister and find the one who murdered his entire family.  
  
MangaPlus: <https://mangaplus.shueisha.co.jp/titles/100009>
description.ru: Танджиро - старший сын в семье, потерявшей кормильца. Однажды он уходит в другой город, чтобы продать древесный уголь, но в конце концов остаётся на ночь в чужом доме, вместо того, чтобы идти домой. А всё из-за слухов о демоне, который разгуливает в горах под покровом темноты. Утром парень вернётся домой живым и невредимым… Но его ждут ужасные известия.
description.vi: Thanh Gươm Diệt Quỷ còn có tên gọi khác là Lưỡi Gươm Diệt Quỷ hay Yaiba Kimetsu. Phim Thanh Gươm Diệt Quỷ: Kimetsu No Yaiba. Vào thời xa xưa, có một truyền thuyết về những con quỷ ăn thịt người luôn lãng vãng trong cánh rừng sâu. Vì điều này, người dân trong làng không bao giờ đi ra ngoài vào trời tối. Truyền thuyến cũng kể rằng có một Sát Quỷ Nhân luôn xuất hiện vào ban đêm để tiêu diệt những con quỷ khát máu này. Đối với chàng trai trẻ Tanjiro, câu chuyện dân gian ấy đã trở thành hiện thực cay đắng mà cậu phải hứng chịu...Sau khi cha cậu qua đời, Tanjiro luôn cố gắng hết sức để trở thành trụ cột trong gia đình. Dù cuộc sống vất vả, cực khổ, những gia đình của cậu vẫn luôn ngập tràn hạnh phúc. Nhưng niềm hạnh phúc ấy cũng không kéo dài lâu được. Một ngày nọ, khi Tanjiro trở về, cậu phát hiện gia đình mình đã bị sát hại dã man, và chỉ có một người duy nhất sống sót, đó là em gái Nezuko của cậu. Nhưng bi kịch thay, Nezuko đã trở thành con quỷ đáng sợ. Tuy nhiên, cô vẫn còn giữ một chút nhân tính. Đó là thời điểm bắt đầu cuộc chiến đơn độc của Tanjiro, tiêu diệt quỷ và tìm cách biến em gái mình trở lại làm người.

title.en: Qi Refining Level 3000: Accept the Empress as your disciple

altTitles.en: Qi Refining Level 3000: Starting with the Empress as your apprentice

altTitles.zh: 炼气3000层：开局收女帝为徒

description.en: Ye Kong traveled through another world, and he could break through a realm every day he fished. In the past ten years, he has broken through to more than 3,000 levels of Qi training. He thought his life would be dull, roasting white tigers and catching phoenixes, but one day, the empress was reborn and came to worship him as her master. Ye Kong: Hey, disciple, can you please stop worrying me? Empress: No way, no way, my master is practicing Qi, he is just pretending, he can never be a peerless master!

altTitles.ja: ポーの一族

description.en:
(from ebookjapan):

Around 1880, the Baron de Portsnell and his family visited a seaside town. They had come from London, and they soon became well known in the city. The baron and his wife and their children, Edgar and Marybelle, exuded an elegance that was out of place in a country town.

The sight of them was like looking at a perfect painting. In fact, their beauty was a magical beauty out of time. They were the "Poe's Clan", vampirnellas who consume human blood. The family rented a house on the outskirts of the city and began to search for someone to welcome into the clan, pretending to be human. 

Edgar was intrigued by Alan Twilight, the son of the city's foremost trader....

[Official English](https://www.fantagraphics.com/products/the-poe-clan-vol-1?_pos=1&_sid=27aa05edc&_ss=r)

---
- **Won the 21st Shogakukan Manga Award for Shojo in 1976, which it shared with Hagio's other serial, They Were Eleven**

altTitles.en: Drop OG - Out of Ganchu
Drop OG: Out of Ganchu
Drop Out of Ganchu
ドロップOG
ドロップOG アウト・オブ・ガンチュー

description.en: Shinogawa Hiroshi dropped out of school after being inspired by delinquents like Iguchi Tatsuya who live by their own rules and who speaks with his fists if anyone opposes him. He spends his days hanging out with other hoodlums, but Hiroshi is all mouth and if he gets into a fight, his ass is easily handed to him. However, this close group of friends, including Tatsuya, are there to protect him when his big mouth gets him in real trouble. However, there seems to be a storm gathering within the gangs of the city and Hiroshi and his crew might be caught in the middle of it!

altTitles.ja: エイティエイトを2でわって

title.en: Mitame Jirai-kei Osananajimi no Ren'ai Story

altTitles.ja: 見た目地雷系幼馴染の恋愛ストーリー

altTitles.ja-ro: Mitame Jirai-kei Osananajimi no Renai Story

altTitles.en: A Love Story About a Childhood Friend Who Looks Like a Landmine Girl
A Landmine-Type-Appearing Childhood Friend's Love Story
My Childhood Friend Who Looks Like a Landmine Type

altTitles.pt-br: Uma história de amor sobre uma amiga de infância que parece um campo minado

altTitles.uk: Історія кохання з подругою дитинства, яка прив'язалася до мене

description.en:
This is my love story with a landmine girl who's convinced that I'm her childhood friend.
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [X](https://x.com/onnoveltet/status/1829430063294738758)
description.ja: 自分のことを幼馴染だと思い込んでいる地雷系女子との恋愛物語です。
description.pt-br: Esta é a minha história de amor com uma garota convencida de que sou seu amigo de infância.

altTitles.ja: 地獄くらやみ花もなき

altTitles.en: No Flowers Even in the Darkness of Hell

description.en:
A beautiful boy detective and his NEET assistant's "hell-bound" case file!

Toono Seiji, who sees criminals as monsters, meets a handsome boy, Saijou Shiroshi, who runs a consultation office in a weathered Western-style house. For some reason, he ends up working as an assistant for Shiroshi, who has excellent insight and bewitchingly good looks...
description.ru: Сэйдзи Тооно - 22-летний NEET, который может видеть истинную сущность людей в виде ёкаев. По стечению обстоятельств он устраивается работать в загадочное агентство, где можно "бесплатно получить консультацию по вашим проблемам" от таинственного мальчика по имени Сайдзё Сироси. Откуда у Сэйдзи такая способность, и почему им так заинтересовался Сироси?

title.en: Yarinaoshi Reijou wa Ryuutei Heika wo Kouryaku-chuu

altTitles.ja: やり直し令嬢は竜帝陛下を攻略中

altTitles.en: The Do-Over Damsel Conquers the Dragon Emperor
The Returnee Noble Lady in the Middle of Conquesting His Majesty the Dragon Emperor

altTitles.es: ¡Vence al Emperador Dragón en esta ronda, Señorita!

altTitles.zh: 重生大小姐正在攻略龙帝殿下

altTitles.en: Win Over the Dragon Emperor This Time Around, Noble Girl!

altTitles.vi: Tiểu Thư Trùng Sinh chinh phục Long Đế Bệ Hạ
小姐重生征服龍帝陛下 (Nom Script)

altTitles.id: Seorang Putri Yang Kembali Ke Masa Lalu Sedang Menaklukkan Kaisar Naga

description.en:
The curtains rise on the tale of a young lady who once stormed the battlefields now getting to start her life all over again!  
  
The young noblewoman, Jill, was sentenced to death by her fiancé, the Crown Prince. Just as she was on the brink of death, time rewinds back to when she was 10 years old, to the party where her engagement had been decided!   
  
Determined to avoid going down the same path to ruin, Jill hastily proposes to the person behind her, only to discover that he’s none other than Hades, the Emperor of the neighboring kingdom who’s (set to) fall into darkness, ergo the worst villain.
description.id:
Jill Savelle- seorang tunangan dari pangeran putra mahkota Gerald de Kleitos yang memiliki gelar "Dewi Perang"- telah diburu oleh negaranya sendiri yang telah dilindunginya. Dikhianati oleh pasangannya sendiri, dia difitnah sebagai sorang penghianat kemudian dijebloskan kedalam penjara. Di waktu-waktu terakhirnya, Jill memiliki banyak penyesalan, tapi ketika ajal sedang menjemputnya, dia tiba-tiba saja terbangun pada saat 6 tahun lalu. Dan kali ini, dia telah bertekad untuk tidak diperalat lagi.

Sekarang, sebagai seorang gadis berusia 10 tahun, Jill memutuskan untuk melarikan diri dari pertunangan dengan pangeran yang menghampirinya. Dan pada akhirnya, dia secara tidak sengaja melamar pria berumur 19 tahun yang dikenal sebagai kaisar naga hades theos rave, yang nantinya akan menghancurkan negaranya. Tapi tanpa disangka, dia malah menerima lamarannya!

Berbanding terbalik dengan ingatan Jill yang dulu, sekarang Jill melihat kalau Hades yang saat ini merupakan seorang kaisar yang sedang tidak beruntung.  Jadi bisakah Jill mencegah sang kaisar terjatuh kedalam jurang kegelapan? ataukah malah nasibnya sudah tidak bisa diubah lagi?

altTitles.ja: 今日も来たんすか、依田先輩。

altTitles.en: Have You Come Again Today, Yoda-senpai?

altTitles.vi: Hôm nay chị lại tới nữa à, Yoda-senpai?

description.en: This woman makes herself at home in my parents' house. She is a senior in the same high school and a friend of my sister's. It seems to take her two hours to get to school each way, so she stays at my house almost every day. Yoda is defenseless and a bit out of the ordinary, and I'm always on the edge of my seat!
description.ja:
**ひとつ屋根の下で巻き起こる、天然小悪魔お姉さん×オタク男子の日常ショートラブコメデイ！**

俺の実家で、我が家のようにくつろぐこの女。 同じ高校の先輩で、姉の友達の依田燈。 学校まで片道2時間らしく、ほぼ毎日俺の家に居座っている。 無防備で少し抜けてる依田先輩に振り回されて、ドキドキしっぱなし!! ひとつ屋根の下で巻き起こる、天然小悪魔お姉さん×オタク男子の日常ショートラブコメデイ！

title.en: Kanojo ni Uwaki Sareteita Ore ga, Koakuma na Kouhai ni Natsukareteimasu

altTitles.ja: カノジョに浮気されていた俺が、小悪魔な後輩に懐かれています

altTitles.en: I Was Cheated On by My Girlfriend, but My Devilish Junior Now Yearns for Me
My Coquettish Junior Attaches Herself to Me!

altTitles.ru: Девушка изменила мне с другим, и теперь моя дьяволёнок-кохай пристаёт ко мне

altTitles.vi: Sau khi bị bạn gái lừa, một tiểu quỷ khoá dưới cứ bám theo tôi.

description.en:
Christmas season.

Hasegawa Yuuta found himself single after breaking up last month when his girlfriend had cheated on him. And it was only a few days until Christmas! After an everyday conversation with his female friend, Mino Ayaka, Yuuta met a beautiful girl clad in a Santa suit—In a lane full of couples no less! Her name was Shinohara Mayu. Will this encounter with Shinohara turn out to be the Christmas present for Yuuta?
description.ja: クリスマス直前に彼女に浮気された大学二年・羽瀬川悠太。 意気消沈する彼の前に、サンタの格好をした美少女後輩・志乃原真由が現れる！ グイグイ来る彼女は、次第に家にまで上がり込むようになり…！？
description.ru: Однажды за несколько дней до Рождества, молодой Хасегава Юта тяжело расстался со своей бывшей девушкой, которая ему изменила. После повседневного диалога со своей давней подругой Мино Аякой, Юта встретил красивую во всех смысла слова девушку по имени Маю Шиномия, одетую в костюм Санты. Неужели внезапная встреча с кокетливой красоткой станет рождественским подарком для Юты?
description.pt-br:
Época natalina.
Yuuta Hasegawa ficou solteiro após terminar o namoro no mês passado, quando sua namorada o traiu. E faltam apenas alguns dias para o Natal!
Após uma conversa casual com sua amiga Ayaka Mino, Yuuta encontra uma linda garota vestida de Papai Noel - justamente em uma rua cheia de casais! Seu nome era Mayu Shinohara.
Será que esse encontro com Shinohara vai se tornar o presente de Natal para Yuuta?

title.en: What, You Dare Pretend in Front of Me, the Strongest in the Immortal World?

altTitles.zh: 你什么档次敢在我仙界最强面前装

altTitles.zh-ro: Ni Shenme Dangci Gan Zai Wo Xianjie Zui Qiang Mianqian Zhuang

altTitles.en: What Quality Do You Dare to Pretend in Front of Me the Strongest in the Immortal World

description.en: The world beyond the ancient mirror and the immortal realm within were originally one entity. The true power of this world lies in the hands of the divine beast with the title “Light,” who battles against a formidable enemy, the divine beast with the title “Dark.” In order to prevent the extinction of humanity, the ancestors of Cheng Song sealed off the immortal realm from the human realm using the ancient mirror, with the assistance of the divine beast of Light. Only those with the bloodline of the Yu family can activate the bronze mirror and enter the immortal realm.

altTitles.ja: 聖母の断罪

altTitles.vi: Lời tuyên án của Đức Mẹ

altTitles.en: Maria's Judgement

description.ar: بعد وفاة ابنها بطريقة مروعة، تكتشف والدتهُ تنمر الآخرين الشديد عليه، فعقدت العزم على معاقبة أولئك المتنمرين الذين أخذوا ابنها الحبيب منها، وبدأت العمل كممرضة في المدرسة
description.en: The Nagare family was a happy home of three people. However, their son Kiritaka was secretly bullied at school. Then, an incident occurs, and the mother Mari's love for her son goes out of control.
description.ne: आमाबुवा र छोरासहित ३ जनाको नागारे परिवारको खुसीको घर थियो। तर, उनीहरुको छोरा किरिताकालाई विद्यालयमा गोप्य रुपमा कुटपिट गरिएको थियो।  त्यसपछि, एउटा घटना घट्छ, र आमा मारियाको छोराप्रतिको माया अनियन्त्रित हुन्छ।
description.vi:
Một gia đình ba người những tưởng đang hạnh phúc, cho đến khi Kiritaka, người con trai duy nhất của Nagare Mari "tự sát" vì "quá đau khổ". Cho rằng bản thân đã vô tình dồn ép con trai yêu quý, Mari toang tìm đến cái chết, nhưng không... cô vô tình phát hiện ra sự thật con trai mình đã liên tục bị bắt nạt suốt một thời gian dài bởi những con quỷ đội lốt người tại trường học.
Và rồi tình thương con da diết của Mari... đã vượt ngoài tầm kiểm soát của trái tim cô.
description.es-la: La familia Nagare era un hogar feliz formado por tres personas. Sin embargo, su hijo Kiritaka sufría acoso escolar extremo en secreto. Entonces, ocurre un incidente que haría que el amor de la madre, Mari, se descontrolara por completo.

altTitles.en: The Man Who Does It With A Ghost
Man With Ghost

description.en:
A man who loathes ghosts, Kim Gi-Tae, one day gets sexually harassed by a naked ghost in the bustling subway.

“If you agree to my conditions, I’ll chase away the ghosts that cling to you. So in exchange, do it with me…”

What is this ghost saying? But… If I lend this ghost my body, will it be possible for me to live a normal life?

Gi-Tae gathers his courage and decides to participate in a trade with the ghost in order to free himself from the ghosts that badger him, but…

title.en: Zennin Ossan, Umarekawattara SSS Rank Jinsei ga Kakutei Shita

altTitles.en: Your SSS-Rank Afterlife Is Confirmed, Virtuous Old Man
As a virtuous middle-aged man, my new life was confirmed to be SSS rank

altTitles.ja: 善人おっさん、生まれ変わったらSSSランク人生が確定した

altTitles.ko: 착한 아재, 다시 태어나니 SSS랭크 인생이 확정됐다

description.en: The virtuous will definitely be rewarded! This world judges the deeds and good karma of your previous life, and grants you a rank when you are reborn. The benevolent man, even surprising the gods through this, decides to be reborn as the son Alexander of a noble family in the same world as his past life, and thus starts his SSS-Rank life! Follow Alec's journey as he lives his life as a SSS Rank!!

altTitles.en: Dropping Blue

description.en: Lin Ling is unfortunate in everything she does… Until the day she met Fang Wan, a kind and perfect upperclassman. She unconsciously grew attracted to her. Somewhere in the vast universe, there is always someone who is closely connected with you, and if fate allows it, you will never be alone.
